name: Nothing Special (Pempille)
description:
A short disturbing game about about being held captive by a mysterious girl.

This was originally going to be a VN Jam entry that I failed to deliver in time,  but I decided to publish it anyways... despite it not being very polished. 

It's my first attempt at making a game and it has around 8k words(That's around 25 minutes of playtime) and 2 endings, hope you like it!

CONTENT WARNINGS: (Possible spoiler)

Profanity, blood, Insects, written heavy violence and death

Screen Shake Effects and Loud noises

Not suitable for children!

Graphics, Writing, Soundtracks made by me

Sound effects are copyright free assets

This game was made with Ren'py.
